address_line_1.description: Fields that start with address_line provide the address's most specific details, like street number, street name, and building name. They do not provide less specific details like city, state/province, or country (these details are provided in other fields).

address_line_3.description: The third line of the address, if any.

administrative_district_level_1.description: A civil entity within the address's country. In the US, this is the state.

administrative_district_level_2.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_1. In the US, this is the county.

administrative_district_level_3.description: A civil entity within the address's administrative_district_level_2, if any.

country.description: The address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

locality.description: The city or town of the address.

organization.description: Optional organization name when it's representing recipient.
